Name: Advanced Carrier II
Rules Text: **Cost: 3, Combat: 9, Move: 2, Capacity: 8**|SUSTAIN DAMAGE
Aliases: adv carrier 2, adv carrier ii, advanced carrier 2

Name: Aerie Hololattice
Rules Text: Other players cannot move ships through systems that contain your structures.|Each planet that contains 1 or more of your structures gains the PRODUCTION 1 ability as if it were a unit.

Name: Aetherstream
Rules Text: After you or one of your neighbors activates a system that is adjacent to an anomaly, you may apply +1 to the move value of all of that player's ships during this tactical action.

Name: AI Development Algorithm
Rules Text: When you research a unit upgrade technology, you may exhaust this card to ignore any 1 prerequisite.|When 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION, you may exhaust this card to reduce the combined cost of the produced units by the number of unit upgrade technologies that you own.

Name: Antimass Deflectors
Rules Text: Your ships can move into and through asteroid fields.|When other players' units use SPACE CANNON against your units, apply -1 to the result of each die roll.

Name: Assault Cannon
Rules Text: At the start of a space combat in a system that contains 3 or more of your non-fighter ships, your opponent must destroy 1 of their non-fighter ships.

Name: Bioplasmosis
Rules Text: At the end of the status phase, you may remove any number of infantry from planets you control and place them on 1 or more planets you control in the same or adjacent systems.

Name: Bio-Stims
Rules Text: You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to ready 1 of your planets that has a technology specialty or 1 of your other technologies.

Name: Carrier II
Rules Text: **Cost: 3, Combat: 9, Move: 2, Capacity: 6**

Name: Chaos Mapping
Rules Text: Other players cannot activate asteroid fields that contain 1 or more of your ships.|At the start of your turn, you may produce 1 unit in a system that contains at least 1 of your units with PRODUCTION.

Name: Crimson Legionnaire II
Rules Text: **Cost: 1 (x2), Combat: 7**|After this unit is destroyed, gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good. Then, place the unit on this card. At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.
Aliases: crimson legionnaire 2, cl 2, cl ii, cl2

Name: Cruiser II
Rules Text: **Cost: 2, Combat: 6, Move: 3, Capacity: 1**

Name: Dacxive Animators
Rules Text: After you win a ground combat, you may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on that planet.

Name: Dark Energy Tap
Rules Text: After you perform a tactical action in a system that contains a frontier token, if you have 1 or more ships in that system, explore that token.|Your ships can retreat into adjacent systems that do not contain other players' units, even if you do not have units or control planets in that system.

Name: Destroyer II
Rules Text: **Cost: 1, Combat: 8, Move: 2**|ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE 6 (x3)

Name: Dimensional Splicer
Rules Text: At the start of a space combat in a system that contains a wormhole and 1 or more of your ships, you may produce 1 hit and assign it to 1 of your opponent's ships.

Name: Dimensional Tear II
Rules Text: This system is a gravity rift; your ships do not roll for this gravity rift. Place a dimensional tear token beneath this unit as a reminder.|Up to 12 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity.|PRODUCTION 7
Aliases: dimensional tear 2, dt ii, dt2, dt 2

Name: Dreadnought II
Rules Text: **Cost: 4, Combat: 5, Move: 2, Capacity: 1**|This unit cannot be destroyed by "Direct Hit" action cards.|SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 5

Name: Duranium Armor
Rules Text: During each combat round, after you assign hits to your units, repair 1 of your damaged units that did not use SUSTAIN DAMAGE during this combat round.
Notes: Applies only after the "Assign Hits" step

Name: E-res Siphons
Rules Text: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, gain 4 trade goods.
Aliases: eres siphons, eres, e res, e res siphons

Name: Exotrireme II
Rules Text: **Cost: 4, Combat: 5, Move: 2, Capacity: 1**|This unit cannot be destroyed by "Direct Hit" action cards. After a round of space combat, you may destroy this unit to destroy up to 2 ships in this system.|SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 4 (x2)

Name: Fighter II
Rules Text: **Cost: 1 (x2), Combat: 8, Move: 2**|This unit may move without being transported. Fighters in excess of your ships' capacity count against your fleet pool.

Name: Fleet Logistics
Rules Text: During each of your turns during the action phase, you may perform 2 actions instead of 1.

Name: Floating Factory II
Rules Text: **Move: 2, Capacity: 5**|This unit is placed in a space area instead of on a planet. This unit can move and retreat as if it were a ship. If this unit is blockaded, it is destroyed.|PRODUCTION 7

Name: Genetic Recombination
Rules Text: You may exhaust this card before a player casts votes; that player must cast at least 1 vote for an outcome of your choice or remove 1 token from their fleet pool and return it to their reinforcements.

Name: Graviton Laser System
Rules Text: You may exhaust this card before 1 or more of your units use SPACE CANNON; hits produced by those units must be assigned to non-fighter ships if able.

Name: Gravity Drive
Rules Text: After you activate a system, apply +1 to the move value of 1 of your ships during this tactical action.

Name: Hegemonic Trade Policy
Rules Text: Exhaust this card when 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION; swap the resource and influence values of 1 planet you control during that use of PRODUCTION.

Name: Hel-Titan II
Rules Text: **Combat: 6**|This unit is treated as both a structure and a ground force. It cannot be transported. You may use this unit's SPACE CANNON against ships that are adjacent to this unit's systems.|PLANETARY SHIELD, SPACE CANNON 5, SUSTAIN DAMAGE, PRODUCTION 1
Aliases: hel-titan 2, hel titan ii, hel titan 2

Name: Hybrid Crystal Fighter II
Rules Text: **Cost: 1 (x2), Combat: 7, Move: 2**|This unit may move without being transported. Each fighter in excess of your ships' capacity counts as 1/2 of a ship against your fleet pool.

Name: Hyper Metabolism
Rules Text: During the status phase, gain 3 command tokens instead of 2.

Name: Impulse Core
Rules Text: At the start of a space combat, you may destroy 1 of your cruisers or destroyers in the active system to produce 1 hit against your opponent's ships; that hit must be assigned by your opponent to 1 of their non-fighter ships if able.

Name: Infantry II
Rules Text: **Cost: 1 (x2), Combat: 7**|After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 6 or greater, place the unit on this card. At the start of the next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.
Notes: If you do not control a planet in your home system at the start of your next turn, the unit is returned to your reinforcements.

Name: Inheritance Systems
Rules Text: You may exhaust this card and spend 2 resources when you research a technology;ignore all of that technology's prerequisites.

Name: Instinct Training
Rules Text: You may exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool when another player plays an action card; cancel that action card.

Name: Integrated Economy
Rules Text: After you gain control of a planet, you may produce any number of units on that planet that have a combined cost equal to or less than that planet's resource value.

Name: L4 Disruptors
Rules Text: During an invasion, units cannot use SPACE CANNON against your units.

Name: Lazax Gate Folding
Rules Text: During your tactical actions, if you do not control Mecatol Rex, treat its system as if it contains both an alpha and a beta wormhole.|Action: If you control Mecatol Rex, you may exhaust this card to place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on Mecatol Rex.

Name: Letani Warrior II
Rules Text: **Cost: 1 (x2), Combat: 7**|After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 6 or greater, place the unit on this card. At the start of the next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.|Production 2
Notes: If you do not control a planet in your home system at the start of your next turn, the unit is returned to your reinforcements.

Name: Light/Wave Deflector
Rules Text: Your ships can move through systems that contain other players' ships.

Name: Magen Defense Grid
Rules Text: You may exhaust this card at the start of a round of ground combat on a planet that contains 1 or more of your units with PLANETARY SHIELD; your opponent cannot make combat rolls during this combat round.
Notes: See also: Magen Defense Grid Omega

Name: Magen Defense Grid Omega
Rules Text: At the start of ground combat on a planet that contains 1 or more of your structures, you may produce 1 hit and assign it to 1 of your opponent's ground forces.

Name: Mageon Implants
Rules Text: Action: Exhaust this card to look at another player's hand of action cards. Choose 1 of those cards and add it to your hand.

Name: Magmus Reactor
Rules Text: Your ships can move into supernovas.|After 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION in a system that either contains a war sun or is adjacent to a supernova, gain 1 trade good.

Name: Magmus Reactor Omega
Rules Text: Your ships can move into supernovas.|Each supernova that contains 1 or more of your units gains the PRODUCTION 5 ability as if it were 1 of your units.

Name: Memoria II
Rules Text: **Cost: 8, Combat: 5 (x2), Move: 2, Capacity: 6**|You may treat this unit as if it were adjacent to systems that contain 1 or more of your mechs.| SUSTAIN DAMAGE, ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE 5 (x3)

Name: Mirror Computing
Rules Text: When you spend trade goods, each trade good is worth 2 resources or 2 influence instead of 1.

Name: Neural Motivator
Rules Text: During the status phase, draw 2 action cards instead of 1.

Name: Neuroglaive
Rules Text: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, that player removes 1 token from their fleet pool and returns it to their reinforcements.

Name: Non-Euclidean Shielding
Rules Text: When 1 of your units uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE, cancel 2 hits instead of 1.

Name: Nullification Field
Rules Text: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool; immediately end that player's turn.

Name: PDS II
Rules Text: You may use this unit's SPACE CANNON against ships that are adjacent to this unit's systems.|PLANETARY SHIELD, SPACE CANNON 5

Name: Plasma Scoring
Rules Text: When 1 or more of your units use BOMBARDMENT or SPACE CANNON, 1 of those units may roll 1 additional die.

Name: Predictive Intelligence
Rules Text: At the end of your turn, you may exhaust this card to redistribute your command tokens.|When you cast votes during the agenda phase, you may cast 3 additional votes; if you do, and the outcome you voted for is not resolved, exhaust this card.

Name: Pre-fab Arcologies
Rules Text: After you explore a planet, ready that planet.
Aliases: prefab arcologies, prefab, pre fab arcologies

Name: Production Biomes
Rules Text: Action: Exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool to gain 4 trade goods and choose 1 other player; that player gains 2 trade goods.

Name: Prototype War Sun II
Rules Text: **Cost: 10, Combat: 3 (x3), Move: 3, Capacity: 6**|Other player's units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD.|SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 3 (x3)

Name: Psychoarchaeology
Rules Text: You can use technology specialties on planets you control without exhausting them, even if those planets are exhausted.|During the action phase, you can exhaust planets you control that have technology specialties to gain 1 trade good.

Name: Quantum Datahub Node
Rules Text: At the end of the strategy phase, you may spend 1 token from your strategy pool give another player 3 trade goods. If you do, give 1 of your strategy cards to that player and take 1 of their strategy cards.

Name: Salvage Operations
Rules Text: After you win or lose a space combat, gain 1 trade good; if you won the combat, you may also produce 1 ship of any type that was destroyed during that combat.

Name: Sarween Tools
Rules Text: When 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION, reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 1.

Name: Saturn Engine II
Rules Text: **Cost: 2, Combat: 6, Move: 3, Capacity: 2**|SUSTAIN DAMAGE
Aliases: saturn engine 2, se ii, se 2, se2

Name: Scanlink Drone Network
Rules Text: When you activate a system, you may explore 1 planet in that system that contains 1 or more of your units.

Name: Self-Assembly Routines
Rules Text: After 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION, you may exhaust this card to place 1 mech from your reinforcements on a planet you control in that system.|After 1 of your mechs is destroyed, gain 1 trade good.
Aliases: sar, self assembly routines, self assembly

Name: Sling Relay
Rules Text: Action: Exhaust this card to produce 1 ship in any system that contains 1 of your space docks.

Name: Space Dock II
Rules Text: This unit's PRODUCTION value is equal to 4 more than the resource value of this planet.|Up to 3 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity.|PRODUCTION X

Name: Spatial Conduit Cylinder
Rules Text: You may exhaust this card after you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your units; that system is adjacent to all systems that contain 1 or more of your units during this activation.

Name: Spec Ops II
Rules Text: **Cost: 1 (x2), Combat: 6**|After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 5 or greater, place the unit on this card. At the start of the next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.
Notes: If you do not control a planet in your home system at the start of your next turn, the unit is returned to your reinforcements.

Name: Strike Wing Alpha II
Rules Text: **Cost: 1, Combat: 8, Move: 2, Capacity: 1**|When this unit uses ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE, each result of 9 or 10 also destroys 1 of your opponent's infantry in the space area of the active system.|ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE 6 (x3)
Aliases: swa ii, swa 2, strike wing alpha 2

Name: Supercharge
Rules Text: At the start of a combat round, you may exhaust this card to apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls during this combat round.

Name: Super-Dreadnought II
Rules Text: **Cost: 4, Combat: 4, Move: 2, Capacity: 2**|This unit cannot be destroyed by "Direct Hit" action cards.|SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 4
Aliases: superdread 2, superdreadnought 2, superdread ii, superdreadnought ii, super dreadnought 2, super dreadnought ii

Name: Temporal Command Suite
Rules Text: After any player's agent becomes exhausted, you may exhaust this card to ready that agent; if you ready another player's agent, you may perform a transaction with that player.

Name: Transit Diodes
Rules Text: You may exhaust this card at the start of your turn during the action phase; remove up to 4 of your ground forces from the game board and place them on 1 or more planets you control.

Name: Transparasteel Plating
Rules Text: During your turn of the action phase, players that have passed cannot play action cards.

Name: Valefar Assimilator X
Rules Text: When you would gain another player's technology using 1 of your faction abilities, you may place the "X" assimilator token on a faction technology owned by that player instead. While that token is on a technology, this card gains that technology's text. You cannot place an assimilator token on a technology that already has an assimilator token.

Name: Valefar Assimilator Y
Rules Text: When you would gain another player's technology using 1 of your faction abilities, you may place the "Y" assimilator token on a faction technology owned by that player instead. While that token is on a technology, this card gains that technology's text. You cannot place an assimilator token on a technology that already has an assimilator token.

Name: Valkyrie Particle Weave
Rules Text: After making combat rolls during a round of ground combat, if your opponent produced 1 or more hits, you produce 1 additional hit.

Name: Voidwatch
Rules Text: After a player moves ships into a system that contains 1 or more of your units, they must give you 1 promissory note from their hand, if able.

Name: Vortex
Rules Text: Action: Exhaust this card to choose another player's non-structure unit in a system that is adjacent to 1 or more of your space docks. Capture 1 unit of that type from that player's reinforcements.

Name: War Sun
Rules Text: **Cost: 12, Combat: 3 (x3), Move: 2, Capacity: 6**|Other player's units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD.|SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 3 (x3)

Name: Wormhole Generator
Rules Text: At the start of the status phase, place or move a Creuss wormhole token into either a system that contains a planet you control or a non-home system that does not contain another player's ships.

Name: Wormhole Generator Omega
Rules Text: Action: Exhaust this card to place or move a Creuss wormhole token into either a system that contains a planet you control or a non-home system that does not contain another player's ships.

Name: X-89 Bacterial Weapon
Rules Text: *Action:* Exhaust this card and choose 1 planet in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships that have BOMBARDMENT; destroy all infantry on that planet.
Notes: See also: X-89 Bacterial Weapon Omega

Name: X-89 Bacterial Weapon Omega
Rules Text: After 1 or more of your units use BOMBARDMENT against a planet, if at least 1 of your opponent's infantry was destroyed, you may destroy all of your opponent's infantry on that planet.
Notes: Updated to be optional in Codex
Aliases: x89 omega, x89 bacterial weapon omega, x-89 omega

Name: Yin Spinner
Rules Text: After 1 or more of your units uses PRODUCTION, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on a planet you control in that system.

Name: Yin Spinner Omega
Rules Text: After you produce units, place up to 2 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control or in any space area that contains 1 or more of your ships.
